ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust ? Or...
ygData.msgSnippet: If you dont know already, you can get dufrenite dust from the ogres in lake rathetear (the ones to your right as you come out of the rathe mountains). Hail
ygData.messageBody:
If you dont know already, you can get dufrenite dust from the ogres in lake
rathetear (the ones to your right as you come out of the rathe mountains).
Hail them and one will say something along the lines of "Me crush dufrenite
gud". If necessary I'll try this out tonight/tomorrow but I'm rather aware
that I wont be able to make it anyways, with my rather feeble 70 skills...
most of my money has been going into the last 20 skill points of jewelcraft.
Thankfully, its starting to seem like jewelcraft will be paying for my
tinkering soon... sold a black pearl gold choker last night for 850 plat,
and its amazing what people will pay for platinum jewelry!

Cogg - Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: Larry Patterson <axehandler@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 11:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust ? Or...


> From: Larry Patterson <axehandler@...>
>
> Just curious why doesn't someone go out and find where
